MCQ.mcq1: How would you prefer to learn a new skill? A) Hands-on activities, games, and interactive lessons  B) Taking an online course or attending a workshop  C) Having someone patiently explain and demonstrate it
MCQ.mcq2: How would you describe your ideal vacation? A) Going to a fun theme park or kid-friendly resort B) Exploring a new city or taking an adventurous trip C) Relaxing at a quiet beach or taking a low-key road trip
MCQ.mcq3: What is most important when making a big life decision? A) Following your passion and pursuing your dreams B) Logistically planning for financial stability and career growth C) Considering your health and quality of life going forward
MCQ.mcq4: How would you prefer to contact customer service? A) Texting a chatbot for a quick solution B) Talking to a live representative over the phone C) Sending an email and waiting for a detailed response
MCQ.mcq5: How do you stay informed about current events? A) Scrolling through social media news feeds B) Reading physical newspapers or watching TV news C) Listening to podcasts or in-depth online articles
MCQ.mcq6: What kind of music do you enjoy the most? A) Upbeat electronic music or catchy pop hits B) Classic rock or alternative music from the 80s and 90s C) A mix of genres depending on mood, including indie or singer-songwriter music
